phase_effects.effect: Adaptation [Glaceon's type stays the same, it just will not take super effective damage from fire damage if that was the majority of damage up until this point]

notes: Skill swap disables ice body healing
Brick break for super effective damage and reflect
Safeguard to prevent sing later
100% ally guard
75% magnet rise
50% reflect. Smack down to counter magnet rise
20% agility
